cause.description:
To save hip hop... and say no to that Commercial sh!t that they are playing on the radio... Start pulling out the classics; like KRS-One, Nas, R.A.K.I.M, Beastie Boys & Run DMC
1. Stop listening to that bullsh!t on the radio
2. Acknowlegde the 5 Elements of Hip Hop
cause.name: Hip Hop is dead
